_header: A mother and maid a child hath born
Subjects: Virgin Mary, songs in honour of; carols, Nativity
_description: Christmas carol — four quatrains (aabb) plus 4-line refrain (abcb): ‘Euixa est puerpera / Quem gabriell predixerat / Quem matris alno gestiens / Clausus Johannes senserat’

CULEe112.First Lines:
A moder and mayde a childe hath borneAs gabriell hath tolde
                    beforne…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…With the fader and holygoostBothe iii and one of myghtes
                    moost
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 192-4.
